organizations: Trump International Hotel & Tower Las Vegas

thread.title: Photos: Clinton, Sanders, others spar in first Democratic debate
thread.title_full: Photos: Clinton, Sanders, others spar in first Democratic debate

title: Photos: Clinton, Sanders, others spar in first Democratic debate
text: Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Photos: Democrats descend on Vegas for their first debate Democratic presidential candidates Bernie Sanders and Hillary Clinton talk to each other on stage prior to the start of the Democratic presidential debate. Post to Facebook Photos: Democrats descend on Vegas for their first debate Democratic presidential candidates Bernie Sanders and Hillary Clinton talk to each other on stage prior to the start of the Democratic presidential debate.  //usat.ly/1LsMnSD   Photos: Democrats descend on Vegas for their first debate Democratic presidential candidates Bernie Sanders and Hillary Clinton talk to each other on stage prior to the start of the Democratic presidential debate. Mike Nelson, European Pressphoto Agency Hillary Rodham Clinton speaks during the Democratic presidential debate. John Locher, AP Democratic Presidential candidates Hillary Clinton and Martin O'Malley on stage prior to the start of the Democratic presidential debate. Mike Nelson, European Pressphoto Agency Presidential hopeful Hillary Clinton gestures while standing beside Bernie Sanders during the first Democratic presidential debate. Frederic J. Brown, AFP/Getty Images Vermont Senator Bernie Sanders speaks as former US Secretary of State Hillary Clinton listens during the national anthem at the start of the Democratic presidential debate. Josh Haner , pool photo Former Virginia Senator Jim Webb, Vermont Senator Bernie Sanders, former U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton, former Maryland Governor Martin O'Malley and former Rhode Island Governor Lincoln Chafee during the national anthem at the start of the Democratic presidential debate. Josh Haner , pool photo Members of the audience listen prior to the start of the Democratic presidential debate. Josh Haner, pool photo CNN host and debate moderator Anderson Cooper prior to the start of the Democratic presidential debate. Josh Haner, pool photo A worker holds a sign at fell in the spin room before the Democratic presidential debate. Alex Wong, Getty Images Photographs of Democratic presidential candidates Bernie Sanders, Hillary Clinton and Martin O'Malley hang on their debate podiums a day before the CNN Democratic debate at the Wynn Las Vegas. Joe Raedle, Getty Images People walk past a billboard with a picture of Democratic presidential candidate Bernie Sanders advertising the debate at the Wynn Las Vegas resort and casino on Oct. 12, 2015. Joe Raedle, Getty Images Fullscreen People chant during a rally in front of the Trump Hotel on Oct. 12, 2015, in Las Vegas. Hillary Clinton spoke at the rally held by the Culinary Union to support a union drive at the Trump Hotel. The hotel tower in back right belongs to the Wynn, where the Democratic presidential debate will be held Tuesday. John Locher, AP Hillary Clinton speaks to union members gathered in front of the Trump International Hotel & Tower Las Vegas on Oct. 12, 2015. Joe Raedle, Getty Images A cameraman films in the debate hall prior to the Democratic presidential debate at the Wynn Las Vegas on Oct. 13, 2015. Mike Nelson, European Pressphoto Agency Senate Minority Leader Harry Reid of Nevada talks to the media before the CNN Democratic presidential debate on Oct. 13, 2015, in Las Vegas. John Locher, AP Members of the media film the debate stage at the Wynn Las Vegas prior to the Democrats' first debate. Mike Nelson, European Pressphoto Agency Supporters of Hillary Clinton march outside the CNN Democratic presidential debate site on Oct. 13, 2015, in Las Vegas. John Locher, AP Like this topic?
